title: How did I get 14-Day suspension because my teammate proceeds to tilt me.
body:
Game 1
In-Game
Galactic Eclipse: go drake
Galactic Eclipse: uc ant kill him
Galactic Eclipse: WTF ARE U DOING
Galactic Eclipse: gg
Galactic Eclipse: no he gonna 1 shot everyone
Galactic Eclipse: gg
Galactic Eclipse: feed my laner and 0 ganks
Galactic Eclipse: 0 drakes
Galactic Eclipse: gg
Galactic Eclipse: he has perma double bufffs
Galactic Eclipse: HOW AM I SUPPOSE TO FKIGN WIN
Galactic Eclipse: ww is so useless
Galactic Eclipse: of course u dont feel that way bc he didnt feed ur fkign laner
Galactic Eclipse: non feeding jg wins
Galactic Eclipse: one that doesnt feed op ass mid laner
Galactic Eclipse: idgaf
Galactic Eclipse: none of u have helped me at all why should i listen
Galactic Eclipse: ww fed my laner 12 kills
Galactic Eclipse: after i traded 1 and 1 with him
Galactic Eclipse: ok bet
--- Before this Caitlyn proceeded to call me a troll. 
Galactic Eclipse: lets\
Galactic Eclipse: dont test me
--I warned them to not test me since I was already tilted. 
Galactic Eclipse: GG
Galactic Eclipse: gj kass
Galactic Eclipse: lol
Galactic Eclipse: they deserve this
Galactic Eclipse: ww feeds my laner gives me 0 help
Galactic Eclipse: proceeds to gank other lanes after feeding mind
Galactic Eclipse: caitlyn backs up ww bc she didnt get her laner fed by jg
Galactic Eclipse: yeah im not dealing with their sht
Galactic Eclipse: calling me the troll lmao
-- Stating the trash talk they said to me and they want me to try for them flaming me.

replies.body:
Fun fact: Nobody makes you tilt. You are in charge of your own behavior. 

Most of that log is pretty negative. Not negative enough to receive an instant 14-day ban, so I am going to guess that you received chat bans and warnings before this. After you come back from this 14-day suspension, be very careful as any further infractions can result in a permanent ban. It should have said this on your punishment card though. Instead of engaging with them, mute at the first sign of negative behavior.

> [{quoted}](name=Kuthillick,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mdAyQouJ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-12-15T20:39:39.079+0000)
>
> Fun fact: Nobody makes you tilt. You are in charge of your own behavior. 
> 
> Most of that log is pretty negative. Not negative enough to receive an instant 14-day ban, so I am going to guess that you received chat bans and warnings before this. After you come back from this 14-day suspension, be very careful as any further infractions can result in a permanent ban. It should have said this on your punishment card though. Instead of engaging with them, mute at the first sign of negative behavior.

ty for warning

Because you flamed and were toxic?

No one forces you to type, that's entirely your choice

yeah it sucks, don't get baited into arguing with the brainless trolls. It doesn't matter how right or good you are, The toxic trolls Will Not Give A Fuck about being right, they simply want to piss other people off. I lost my main to this arguing back with toxic people shit, apparently all it takes is you responding to the troll a few times to become apart of the toxicity (doesn't matter if you're being bullied or if you're making sense of shit a bully can't ,blah blah you'll take all the fault.)

Because you successfully tilted and then flamed. The fact someone baited you into doing it has no impact on the fact you chose to do it.

Trolls _love_ getting victims as easily manipulated as you, people just chomping at the bit to have a justified meltdown. If you really feel a need to "strike back", just silently block them. They will slowly get madder and madder as they cant figure out why you are not biting on their line like a concussed eel.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mdAyQouJ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-12-15T20:58:51.074+0000)
>
> Because you successfully tilted and then flamed. The fact someone baited you into doing it has no impact on the fact you chose to do it.
> 
> Trolls _love_ getting victims as easily manipulated as you, people just chomping at the bit to have a justified meltdown. If you really feel a need to "strike back", just silently block them. They will slowly get madder and madder as they cant figure out why you are not biting on their line like a concussed eel.

I will implement this and remember the bottom portion.
